name: Daniel Phillips
personality: Disciplined and strategic thinker with a calm demeanor.
story: Daniel Phillips was born and raised in the UK. After graduating high school, he joined the British Army and quickly rose through the ranks due to his sharpshooting skills. He has been deployed to several conflict zones and has received several commendations for his bravery and precision in combat. His marriage to his wife, Emma, has been a source of stability for him and his two children.
